nodes.text: The Bora Vio cloning facility was maintained and later abandoned by the Kaminoans on Bora Vio. Early in the Imperial Era, Kaminoan Prime Minister Lama Su arranged a rendezvous at the facility between his aide Taun We and the bounty hunter Cad Bane so Bane could hand over the young clone Omega, whom he had retrieved. However, another hunter, Fennec Shand, was sent to the facility to rescue the girl, resulting in a fight between the two hunters.
The Bora Vio cloning facility contained embryo tubes which contained "failed experiments" with the corpses of sentient beings.
